content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Hi. I need someone to fix a leak under my kitchen sink. It's getting worse by the hour.
Thank you for letting me know! I understand how urgent this is. May I have your name, please, so I can get things started for you?
Thank you, Marsha. Can you please provide your address so I can make sure we have a technician available in your area?
Thank you, I have your address as 1421 Greenvale Drive, Benton, TX 75101. Let me quickly make sure you are in our service area.
Great news – we cover your area! Could you please let me know your ideal time for a plumber to visit? We have urgent slots and can do same-day when possible.
As soon as possible. My kitchen is turning into a swimming pool.
Understood. I’m checking for the earliest available plumber for you right now.
We have a technician available to arrive within the next 2 hours. Would you like to confirm this appointment?
Yes! But how much is this going to cost? I don't want any surprises.

I understand the importance of price. I can provide an estimate for a standard kitchen sink leak repair, but the technician will confirm exact pricing before any work begins. Let me get an estimate for you now.

Our typical fee for a kitchen sink leak repair starts at $120, plus parts if needed. The technician will review any extra costs with you before proceeding. Would you like to book the plumber for the next available slot?
That’s fine, just get someone out here. I’ll be waiting.
Thank you, Marsha. Your appointment is confirmed for today in the next 2 hours. Our technician will contact you before arrival. If you have any questions or concerns, reply here any time.
